Posts.Content: HI, I have been taking tamoxifen for 4 months now and the most common side effect and the one I have the most is the hot flushes they happen a lot . Also I have some muscle pain in my arms but that's it. I have heard through doctors and others the manufacturer of the brand has a lot to do with the side effects. I use workhart brand and believe they are the ones with the least side effects. They all have the common hot flush side effects. Hoping it calms down soon the more it gets into my body. I had lobular cancer and had chemo and mastectomy and rads so some of the muscle pain may be from that but it didn't start happening until I started taking tamoxifen. All the best to you take care and hope you get on ok with it if not change brand x
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen - Discuss

Posts.Content: The anxiety of having my first follow up yearly mammogram and scan is now over. I have never felt so much stress going in its such a scary feeling. I'm happy to say that it all came back clear. I don't think the anxiety will ever go away fully or will it ?? Early days being thankful it has still not reared it's ugly head and move on ..onwards and upwards
Posts.Title: Relieved after results

Posts.Content: Your nurse will give you a hug don't you worry you have been through so much. It's your choice and your body you do what is right for you and the advice from your doctors. I wanted both taken off but they would only take the one with the tumor so I have the anxiety of the other one being affected but they said that was very rare. But I know I done the right thing. X
Posts.Title: last chemo,

Posts.Content: I was the same now I don't care about my hair and it's grew back very thick and curly. I have chosen not to have re construction as I was told my type of cancer could be hidden behind the implant. I'm quite happy with my prosthesis which to be honest I don't wear very often. I am adjusting to life without a boob I really don't think I could go through another big op. Will be thinking of you today x
